quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the G20 Cyber Security Exercise and Drill under India’s G20 presidency has been inaugurated. It has been conducted by which of the following organizations?
options: National Critical Information Infrastructure Protection Centre
Intelligence Bureau
Indian Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-In)
Directorate of Revenue Intelligence
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following targets is/are correct with regards to National Civil Aviation Policy (NCAP 2016)?

A.     Domestic ticketing to 100 crore by 2027.

B.      International ticketing to 50 crore by 2027.

C.      Cargo volumes to 10 million tonnes by 2027.
options: A and B
A and C
A only
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the first G-20 Education Working Group (EdWG) Meeting has been organized in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. The EdWG was established in 2018 during ___________ Presidency.
options: Spain’s
Australia’s
French
Canada’s
Argentina’s

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Mission LiFE?

A.     Concept was introduced at COP27.

B.      It is being piloted by NITI Aayog.

C.      It aims to turn at least 80% of all villages and ULBs environment friendly by 2028.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Green Skill Development Programme (GSDP) was launched in which of the following years by the Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEF&CC)?
options: 2017
2020
2022
2019
2015

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the Ministry of Jal Shakti has informed about the Inter-Linking of Rivers (ILR) in India. Which of the following states are involved in the Ken-Betwa Inter-Link Project?
options: Uttar Pradesh and Rajasthan
Rajasthan and Madhya Pradesh
Madhya Pradesh and Maharashtra
Uttar Pradesh and Madhya Pradesh
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Operation SADBHAVANA?

A.     It is an initiative of Indian Air Force.

B.      Its operation area is Northeast India.

C.      It aims to address aspirations of people affected by terrorism in the region.
options: A and B
B and C
C only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: As on February 1st, 2023, the Government e-Marketplace (GeM) has achieved a staggering Rs 1.5 lakh crore of Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) in FY23 alone. GeM has an annual target of ___________.
options: Rs 1.5 lakh crore
Rs 1.9 lakh crore
Rs 2.0 lakh crore
Rs 1.75 lakh crore
Rs 3.0 lakh crore

quiz.text: 15th Finance Commission has recommended grants aggregating to _________ over the period of five years (2021-2026) through local government to strengthen the healthcare system in states.
options: Rs. 70,051 Crores
Rs. 60,051 Crores
Rs. 65,051 Crores
Rs. 48,051 Crores
Rs. 52,051 Crores

quiz.text:
As mentioned in the Union Budget 2023-24, Mission to eliminate __________ by 2047

will be launched, which will entail awareness creation, universal screening of 7 crore people in the age group of 0-40 years in affected tribal areas.
options: Dengue
Visceral Leishmaniasis
Tuberculosis
Sickle Cell Anaemia
Malaria

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), Nasha Mukt Bharat Abhiyaan (NMBA) has been mentioned in the Parliament Budget Session. NMBA was launched in which of the following years?
options: 1999
2004
2022
2015
2020

quiz.text:
Recently (Feb 2023), Department of Health and Family Welfare has launched a Digital Portal for Crowd Funding and Voluntary Donations for Patients of Rare Diseases in accordance with the mandate of the National Policy for Rare Diseases (NPRD), 2021. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to NPRD 2021?

A.     Policy has categorized rare disease in 3 groups.

B.      Group 1 diseases require lifelong treatment.

C.      Financial support of Rs. 20 lakh is provided for Group 1 diseases.
options: A and B
A, B and C
B and C
A only
A and C

quiz.text:
Recently (Feb 2023), An update has been released by Ministry of Health and Family Welfare on status of the Pradhan Mantri National Dialysis Programme. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the PM NDP?

A.     It was launched in 2016-17.

B.      It is implemented by National Health Mission.

C.      Only Haemodialysis is covered under the programme.
options: A and B
B only
A only
B and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), AMR surveillance network of state medical college labs (NARS-Net) has been established to generate quality data on AMR. National Action Plan on containment of Antimicrobial Resistance (NAP-AMR) was launched in which of the following years?
options: 2019
2012
2015
2017
2021

quiz.text:
Recently (Feb 2023), For the year 2022-23, a total of Rs. 120.98 crore has been allocated for National Tele-Mental Health Programme (NTMHP) by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Tele-MANAS?

A.     It was launched in 2021.

B.      NIMHANS, Bengaluru is the nodal implementing agency.

C.      Technology support is provided by National Health Systems Resource Centre (NHRSC)
options: A and B
B only
A and C
B and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: ____________ is/are the central nodal agency to set up and operate a single window green energy open access system.
options: NTPC Limited
Power Grid Corporation of India
Grid controller of India Limited (Grid-India)
1 and 2
1 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), Union Minister for Environment, Forest and Climate Change has launched the ‘Save Wetland Campaign’ at Nanda Lake. Nanda Lake is located in which of the following states/UTs?
options: Goa
Rajasthan
Maharashtra
Tamil Nadu
Bihar

quiz.text:
As mentioned in the Union Budget 2023-24, which of the following programmes/schemes is/are incorrectly matched with their objectives?

A.     Green Credit Programme - to incentivize sustainable actions.

B.      PM PRANAM - to incentivize states/UTs to promote alternative pesticides.

C.      MISHTI - for wetland expansion along coastline.
options: A and B
B and C
B only
C only
None of the above

quiz.text: ‘Sagar Parikrama’ programme has been launched by which of the following ministries?
options: Ministry of Defence
Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Waterways
Ministry of Tourism
Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying
Ministry of Culture

quiz.text: Which of the following is the National Implementing Entity(s) for implementation of adaptation projects under National Adaptation Fund for Climate Change (NAFCC)?
options: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development
NITI Aayog
Central Pollution Control Board
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to India Energy Week 2023?

A. Prime Minister of India inaugurated the India Energy Week (IEW) 2023 in Bengaluru, Karnataka.

B. It has been organised by Ministry of Power.

C. Theme of the event was ‘Growth Towards Sustainable Future’.
options: A and B
B and C
A only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Recently (Feb 2023), at the India Energy Week 2023, Prime Minister has launched the

uniforms made of recycled PET bottles under the ‘Unbottled’ initiative of _________.
options: Indian Oil Corporation
Oil India Limited
Varun Beverages
Zen Technologies
GAIL India

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), Enhancing Circularity and Sustainability Project has been  mentioned in the Parliament Budget Session. It is being implemented by GoI in collaboration with ___________.
options: World Economic Forum
United Nations Development Programme
World Bank
United Nations Environmental Programme
Asian Development Bank

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the initiatives taken by the Government of India to incentivize private sector investment in Renewable Energy (RE) Industry have been mentioned in the Parliament Budget Session. Which of the following initiatives is/are incorrectly mentioned below?
options: 100% Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) allowed under the Automatic Route.
Waiver of Inter State Transmission System (ISTS) charges for projects to be commissioned by 30th June 2025.
Declaration of trajectory for Renewable Purchase Obligation (RPO) up to 2026-27.
Green Term Ahead Market (GTAM) launched to facilitate sale of RE Power through exchanges.
None of the above

quiz.text: What is the percentage of female workers registered on the e-shram portal as per Union Budget 2023-24?
options: 52.8%
48.2%
56.5%
42.8%
46.5%

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to e-shram portal?

A.     It was launched in 2021.

B.      Unorganized workers aged 16 to 59 years are eligible to get registered on the portal.

C.      Death or permanent disability cover of Rs. 5 lakh is provided.
options: A and C
A and B
B and C
B only
C only

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the Initiatives by the Government of India for the welfare of female workers were discussed in the Parliament Budget Session. Creche Facility is mandatory for establishments having ___________ employees.
options: 10 or more
50 or more
20 or more
100 or more
5 or more

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), data on Foreign Inward Remittances to India was shared in the Parliament Budget Session. Which of the following are the top 3 countries with major share in Inward Remittances in 2020-21?
options: UAE, USA, Saudi Arabia
Qatar, Singapore, UAE
Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Singapore
United Kingdom, USA, Singapore
UAE, USA, UK

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Group of Twenty (G20)?

A.     It was established in the year 1992.

B.      G20 members represent over 85% of the global trade.

C.      Its secretariat is located in Munich, Germany.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the 2nd Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) Young Scientist Conclave has been hosted at Jawaharlal Nehru Centre for Advanced Scientific Research (JNCASR), Bengaluru, Karnataka. The event was organized by which of the following entities?
options: Department of Science & Technology
NITI Aayog
CII
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Which of the following was the theme of the 9th Asian Ministerial Energy Roundtable (AMER9)?
options: Mapping new pathways for energy security, inclusive growth and energy transitions
Mapping new pathways for sustainability, inclusive growth and energy transitions
Mapping new pathways for sustainabilty, inclusive growth and energy security
Mapping new pathways for green energy
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to IEF?

A.     It is the world’s 2nd largest international organization of energy ministers from 72 countries.

B.      It was established in 1991.

C.      It is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently in Feb 2023, an MoU has been signed which will enable Primary Agricultural Credit Societies (PACS) to provide services offered by Common Service Centres (CSC). The MoU has been signed by which of the following entities?
options: Ministry of Cooperation
Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
NABARD
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), a reply has been submitted by Ministry of Steel regarding status of steel consumption in the country. Per capita steel consumption is around 77.2 Kg and National Steel Policy, 2017, envisages to increase the per capita steel consumption to _________ by 2030-31.
options: 120 Kg
200 kg
180 Kg
160 Kg
233 Kg
